text: Sun Qiaolu (12 June, 1995 â€“ 1 January, 2021) was a Chinese actress. Sun appeared in the Chinese children's TV series Ba La La Little Demon Fairy as the fairy Ling Meiqi. After the show ended, she was in the fashion business and became a social media influencer. Sun died of a heart attack on 1 January, 2021, aged 25. ==References== Category:Chinese television actors Category:1995 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chinese businesspeople Category:Disease- related deaths in China Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Sun Qiaolu
